## [1.0.] filer() function to identify files of interest
```{r}
filer <- function(fdr, dir, ext='mergePeak'){
    return(
      base::list.files(
          path = dir,
          full.names = TRUE
        ) %>%
      stringr::str_subset(ext) %>%
      stringr::str_subset(
        base::paste0(".*/",fdr,'\\..*')
      )
    )
  }
```

## [1.1.] reader() function
```{r}
reader <- function(filename, fdr = 5L, chroms = sel_chrom, skip=1L){
  return(
    readr::read_delim(
        file = filename,
        delim = "\t",
        quote = "",
        col_names = base::c(
            "chr","start","end",
            "sign","score","strand",
            "thickStart","thickEnd","RGB"
          ),
        col_types = readr::cols_only(
            chr = readr::col_character(),
            start = readr::col_integer(),
            end = readr::col_integer(),
            sign = readr::col_double()
          ),
        skip = skip
      ) %>%
    dplyr::filter(
        chr %in% sel_chrom
      ) %>% 
    dplyr::mutate(
      cond = stringr::str_replace(
          string = filename,
          pattern = '.*/(.*)_peaks/.*',
          replacement = '\\1'
        )
      )
    )
  }
```

## [1.2.] merger() function to reduce peaks bedr-dependent
```{r}
merger <- function(df, chosenEngine="bedtools"){
    
    out <- tryCatch(
        {
          if(!bedr::check.binary(chosenEngine)){
            stop(
              base::paste0("Chosen engine:\t",chosenEngine,"\tnot available.\n")
            )
          }else{
            
            is.df.valid <- df %>%
              base::as.data.frame() %>%
              bedr::is.valid.region(
                  check.chr = FALSE
                )
            
            dfVal <- df %>%
              dplyr::filter(
                  dplyr::row_number() == base::which(is.df.valid)
                ) %>% 
              base::as.data.frame()
            
            dfSort <- bedr::bedr(
                engine = chosenEngine,
                input = base::list(i=dfVal),
                method = "sort",
                params = "",
                check.chr = FALSE,
                check.valid = TRUE,
                check.sort = FALSE
              )
            
            dfMerg <- bedr::bedr(
                engine = chosenEngine,
                input = base::list(i=dfSort),
                method = "merge",
                params = "-c 4 -o distinct",
                check.chr = FALSE,
                check.valid = TRUE,
                check.sort = TRUE,
                check.merge = FALSE
              )
            
            dfMerg %>%
              tibble::as.tibble() %>%
              dplyr::arrange(chr, start)
            
          }
      },
      error = function(cond){
          base::message(cond)
          return(NA)
        },
      warning = function(cond){
          base::message(cond)
          return(NA)
        }
    )
    
    return(out)
  }
```

## [1.3.] Helper function extract_matrix()
#### see [6.0.] in '20180711_MouseCortex/src/20180718_workflow_heatmaps'
```{r}
extract_matrix <- function(track, regions, size) {
  sum <- base::suppressWarnings(
      .Call(
        "BWGFile_summary",
        base::path.expand(rtracklayer::path(track)), 
        base::as.character(GenomicRanges::seqnames(regions)),
        IRanges::ranges(regions),
        S4Vectors::recycleIntegerArg(
            size, "size", base::length(regions)
          ),
        "mean",
        base::as.numeric(NA_real_), 
        PACKAGE = "rtracklayer"
      )
    )
  return(
      base::do.call(rbind, sum)
    )
  }
```

## [3.2.] Calculate means & stderrs
```{r}
comb_plot <- plyr::ldply(
      .data = matrices
    ) %>%
  tidyr::pivot_longer(
      cols = -.id,
      names_to = "position",
      values_to = "intensity"
    ) %>%
  dplyr::mutate(
      position = base::as.integer(position)
    ) %>%
  dplyr::group_by(.id,position) %>%
  dplyr::summarise(
      mean = base::mean(intensity, na.rm = TRUE),
      std = stats::sd(x = intensity, na.rm = TRUE)/
        base::sqrt(base::sum(!base::is.na(intensity))),
      .groups = "drop_last"
    ) %>%
  dplyr::mutate(
      step = steps
    )

ids = comb_plot %>%
  dplyr::distinct(.id) %>%
  dplyr::pull(.id)

conds = purrr::map_chr(
    .x = ids,
    .f  = function(id){
      return(
        stringr::str_replace(
          string = id,
          pattern = "(.*?)_S.*",
          replacement = "\\1"
        )
      )
    }
  )
```

#### individual NanoDam replicates: '.x = 1:3' / 'n <- base::basename(fns[id+1])'
#### all individual files: '.x = 1:7' / 'n <- base::basename(fns[id+1])'
#### evaluate with 'prc_roc_plot_ %>% dplyr::group_by(name) %>% dplyr::slice_tail(n=10)'
```{r}
prc_roc_plot_ <- purrr::map_dfr(
  .x = fg_nrs,
  .f = function(id){
    n <- base::basename(fns[id]) %>%
      stringr::str_replace(
          string = .,
          pattern = "^(.*)_peaks.*",
          replacement = "\\1"
        )
    ##<<necessary?_start>>
    # not_fg <- base::length(fg[[base::as.character(id)]]) -
    #   base::length(overlap[[base::as.character(id)]])
    ##<<necessary?_end>>
    not_fg <- GenomicRanges::mcols(
        fg[[base::as.character(id)]][
            !(GenomicRanges::mcols(fg[[base::as.character(id)]])[,"rank"] %in%
            overlap[[base::as.character(id)]]@from)
          ]
      )[,"rank"]

    return(
        fg[[base::as.character(id)]] %>%
          tibble::as_tibble() %>%
          dplyr::mutate(
            pres = purrr::map_lgl(
                .x = rank,
                .f = function(l){
                  l %in% overlap[[base::as.character(id)]]@from
                }
              ),
            not_incl_fg = base::length(not_fg),
            pres_nr = base::cumsum(pres),
            nonpres_nr = base::cumsum(!pres),
            prec = (pres_nr/(pres_nr + nonpres_nr)),
            recall = pres_nr/base::length(bg),
            rev_spec = nonpres_nr/base::length(not_fg),
            name = n
          )
      )
    }
  )
```

## [4.5.] aucROC & aucPRC
```{r eval=FALSE}
x = prc_roc_plot$rev_spec
y = prc_roc_plot$recall
from = base::min(x, na.rm = TRUE)
to = base::max(x, na.rm = TRUE)
space.interp = base::sort(
  base::unique(
    base::c(from, to, x[x > from & x < to])
    )
  )
values <- stats::approx(
    x = x,
    y = y,
    xout = space.interp
  )
aucROC <- 0.5 * base::sum(
    base::diff(values$x) * (
        values$y[-1] + values$y[-length(values$y)]
      )
  )

x = prc_roc_plot$recall
y = prc_roc_plot$prec
from = base::min(x, na.rm = TRUE)
to = base::max(x, na.rm = TRUE)
space.interp = base::sort(
  base::unique(
    base::c(from, to, x[x > from & x < to])
    )
  )
values <- stats::approx(
    x = x,
    y = y,
    xout = space.interp
  )
aucPRC <- 0.5 * base::sum(
    base::diff(values$x) * (
        values$y[-1] + values$y[-length(values$y)]
      )
  )
```

## [5.0.] Identify files
```{r}
fns <- base::list.files(
      path = here::here("data/"),
      recursive = TRUE,
      full.names = TRUE
    ) %>%
  stringr::str_subset("preseq")
```

## [5.1.] Read in data
```{r}
ps_ <- purrr::map_dfr(
    .x = fns,
    .f = function(f){
      n <- stringr::str_replace(
          string = base::basename(f),
          pattern = "^(.*).preseq.*",
          replacement = "\\1"
        )
      return(
        readr::read_delim(
            file = f,
            delim = "\t",
            skip = 1,
            col_names = base::c("total_reads","distinct_reads"),
            col_types = readr::cols(
              .default = readr::col_double()
            )
          ) %>%
        dplyr::mutate(
          name = n
        )
      )
    }
  )
```

## [5.2.] Prepare data for plotting
```{r}
ps <- ps_ %>%
  dplyr::mutate(
      cond_ = stringr::str_replace(
          string = name,
          pattern = "^.*?_(.*?)_.*",
          replacement = "\\1"
        ),
      merg = dplyr::case_when(
          stringr::str_detect(name,"merge") ~ "merge",
          TRUE ~ "replicate"
        ),
      cond = base::paste0(cond_,"_",merg)
    ) %>%
  dplyr::select(-`cond_`,-merg) %>%
  dplyr::filter(!stringr::str_detect(cond, "merge"))

lim <- ps %>%
  dplyr::distinct(name) %>%
  dplyr::pull(name)
```

## [5.3.] Plot data
```{r}
col_1 <- base::c(
    "darkorange","orange","orange",
    "darkgreen", "green", "green",
    "darkred", "red", "red",
    "darkblue", "blue", "blue"
  )
col_2 <- base::c(
    base::rep("#3CB85D",2),
    base::rep("darkgreen",2),
    base::rep("red",2),
    base::rep("darkred",2)
  )

ggplot2::ggplot(
      data = ps,
      mapping = aes(
        x = total_reads,
        y = distinct_reads,
        colour = name
      )
    ) +
  geom_line() +
  geom_abline(
      intercept = 0,
      slope = 1,
      linetype = "dashed",
      colour = "grey65"
    ) +
  theme_bw() +
  scale_colour_manual(
      limits = lim,
      breaks = lim,
      values = col_2
    ) +
  theme(
      aspect.ratio = 1,
      legend.position = "none"
    )
```
